message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
Considering the inflation, I think this is a fair offer. Let's split the difference.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is eating our money. I'll take a small hit and offer you $45, but this is my final concession.
Inflation is hitting us both, but you're losing more value than me. I think this is a reasonable adjustment.
Bob, let's be real. Inflation is hurting us both.  This 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it or leave it -  we're running out of time!
